Package de.unisaarland.cs.se.selab.state

Class State

java.lang.Object
de.unisaarland.cs.se.selab.state.State
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuildingState, CombatState, EndGameState, PreGameState, RegistrationState
public abstract class State extends Object
The superclass for all game states.

The state's logic is implemented in the run() function. This function always returns the next state that should be run. Every state has access to the current game model and server connection.

      public abstract State run()
      This method is called by the Server and contains all the functionality of the state.

    • isEndState

      public boolean isEndState()
      This method indicates whether this state is an end state.

      If an end state is encountered, the server will exit without calling run() on the state.

      Returns:
      whether this state is an end state
